Title: Requires general hospitals and nursing homes to offer free notarial services to patients
Summary: Requires general hospitals and nursing homes to offer free notarial services to patients; requires an employee of such general hospital or nursing home who is a notary public to be present from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. on business days.
LawCode: Add ยง2805-aa, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring general hospitals and nursing homes to offer free notarial services to patients
